means: 权力下放，将（权力等）自中央政府转到地方政府( decentralize的过去式和过去分词 )
将（工业、工人等）自集中点分散到较大的区域内

sentence.Network_en: State superintendence of fisheries shall operate under the principle of unified leadership and decentralized administration.
sentence.Network_cn: 国家对渔业的监督管理,实行统一领导、分级管理.

sentence.Network_en: We decentralized our operations last year and opened several regional offices.
sentence.Network_cn: 去年我们分散了业务，开设了几个地方办事处。

sentence.Network_en: This decentralized economic system relied on the legal immobility of the serf.
sentence.Network_cn: 这种分散的经济制度依赖于农奴在法律上的固定性.

entry.tran: 使（政府或大型机构）权力分散;下放…的权力
entry.def: To decentralize government or a large organization means to move some departments away from the main administrative area, or to give more power to local departments.

example.ex: They have decentralised the company and made it less bureaucratic.
example.tran: 他们已经分解了该公司的权力，以抑制其官僚作风。

example.ex: ...the need to decentralize and devolve power to regional governments...
example.tran: 将权力下放并移交给地方政府的需要

means.word_mean: 1. withdrawn from a center or place of concentration; especially having power or function dispersed from a central to local authorities;

auth_sentence.content: The future—even the present—belongs not to the central re-election committee but to the decentralized single-issue swarm.
auth_sentence.res_content: The future—even the present—belongs not to the central re-election committee but to the decentralized single-issue swarm.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: The future—even the present—belongs not to the central re-election committee but to the decentralized single-issue swarm.

auth_sentence.content: He had already written dissertations on Augustine and Bonaventura, and even a book arguing for a decentralized Church.
auth_sentence.res_content: He had already written dissertations on Augustine and Bonaventura, and even a book arguing for a decentralized Church.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: He had already written dissertations on Augustine and Bonaventura, and even a book arguing for a decentralized Church.

auth_sentence.content: He wanted a decentralized, even disorganized company where independent ideas would prevail over groupthink.
auth_sentence.res_content: He wanted a decentralized, even disorganized company where independent ideas would prevail over groupthink.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: He wanted a decentralized, even disorganized company where independent ideas would prevail over groupthink.
